alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:31PM EDT until August 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Luce County in eastern Upper Michigan... Northeastern Schoolcraft County in east central Upper Michigan... Northeastern Alger County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 431 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Luce, northeastern Schoolcraft and northeastern Alger Counties, including the following locations... Melstrand, Snyder Lake, Cusino Lake, Nawakwa Lake, Kingston Lake and Beaver Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
